main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Bynum, Alabama on December 6, 1958.
interesting points: The UFO was described as oval-shaped, measuring 30-40 feet in diameter, first stationary before rapidly accelerating and disappearing., Witnesses included civilian guards from the Anniston Ordnance Depot., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object was initially detected by moonlight reflecting off of it., Weather conditions were clear with temperatures around 30Â°F.
witness description: Civilian guards at the Anniston Ordnance Depot
